documentation.description: Returns geospatial search results in a binary Mapbox vector tile (`.mvt`) file.

index.description: Comma-separated list of data streams, indices, or aliases to search; use `*`, `_all`, or an empty string to search all data streams and indices

field.description: Field containing geospatial data to return. Must be a `geo_point` or `geo_shape` field.

zoom.description: Zoom level for the vector tile. Valid values are `0`-`29`.

x.description: X tile coordinate for the vector tile.

y.description: Y tile coordinate for the vector tile.

size.description: Maximum number of features to return
